p: Patients with COVID-19 experiencing arrhythmia had an increased risk of poor outcome (RR 7.96 [3.77, 16.81], p < 0.001; I 2: 71.1%, p = 0.02) ( Fig. 3). Sensitivity analysis removing the study of Zhang Guqin et al. showed the statistical robustness of the effect estimate (RR 5.83 [3.26, 10.42], p < 0.001; I 2: 54%, p = 0.11).
